mapper.select: select * from menu order by menu_id desc
select * from ( select rank() over(order by menu_id desc) as no, m.* from (select * from menu) m ) mm where no between #{ start } and #{ end }
select * from menu where menu_id=#{ menu_id }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Menu( menu_category, menu_name, menu_content, menu_price, menu_img, menu_popularity, menu_hidden, menu_soldout, menu_cdate, menu_status, shop_id ) VALUES ( #{menu_category}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_content}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_img}, #{menu_popularity}, #{menu_hidden}, #{menu_soldout}, CURRENT_DATE, 1, #{shop_id} );
mapper.delete: update menu set menu_status=0 where menu_id=#{menu_id}
mapper.update: update menu set menu_img=#{ menu_img } where menu_id=#{ menu_id }

update menu set menu_category=#{ menu_category }, menu_name=#{ menu_name }, menu_content=#{ menu_content }, menu_price=#{ menu_price }, menu_popularity=#{ menu_popularity }, menu_hidden=#{ menu_hidden }, menu_soldout=#{ menu_soldout } where menu_id=#{ menu_id }
